alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 9:45AM EDT until March 14 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .The Patoka River near Princeton continues in minor flood, but is falling. It is forecast to fall below flood stage tonight. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.3 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
